id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription.

catalog_id.description: The unique identifier of the catalog entry.

period_start.description: The date the subscription was started.

period_expire.description: The date the subscription will expire; only applicable on pre-paid subscriptions.

sku_quantity.description: The SKU quantity; only applicable on pre-paid subscriptions.

sku_used.description: The amount SKU assigned to tenants; only applicable if the value is greater than `0`.

$catalog.description: A reference view of the catalog entry.

$tenants.description: A reference view of the tenants, excluding its $subscription reference view.

created_at.description: The date the subscription was created.

updated_at.description: The date the subscription was last modified.
